DOC.brief_summary: The metabolic effects of ghrelin is investigated by microdialysis technique. Subjects are healthy young men. End points are interstitial concentrations of glucose, lactate, and glycerol.
DOC.brief_title: Local Metabolic Effects of Ghrelin in Skeletal Muscle and Adipose Tissue
DOC.criteria: healthy male age 1865 years (included) Body mass index 2025 (included) alcohol abuse malignant disease use of any medicine except otc painkillers any disease recognized participation in a trial using radioactive isotopes within the last 6 months
